feed.title: Habitica Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.0 May 2025 Content
entry.content:
API

  • Content: Item and background releases for May 2025 (@CuriousMagpie and @beffymaroo)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Use Sprite component in modals containing display of mounts (@phillipthelen)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.1 Cryptid Pet Hotfix
entry.content:
Client

  • Fix: Restore missing CSS for Cryptid series of pets (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.2 Party Dropdown Fix
entry.content:
Client

  • Fix: Add missing properties to party member modal selection list, correcting issue where the element would collapse strangely after use (@CuriousMagpie)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.3 Forgot Password Assist
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Feature: If an email query parameter is passed to the forgot-password URL, prefill the forgot password form with that address (@phillipthelen)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.36.4 Logging Fix and June Content
entry.content:
API

  • Content: New items and cosmetics for June 2025 (@CuriousMagpie)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Don't send empty err events from Vue error logger (@SabreCat)

Scripts

  • Perf: Use string literal email query instead of regex when deleting accounts for GDPR compliance (@SabreCat)
